title: Update WhatsApp/phone number 6374350379 to 6374942194

requirements.text: Replace the phone/WhatsApp number 6374350379 with 6374942194 across the frontend, including the shared phone number selector list and any direct tel: links in the Contact section, ensuring both the underlying dial/wa.me number and the human-formatted display text are updated consistently (country code +91).
acceptanceCriteria: In PhoneNumberSelector, the entry that previously used +916374350379 / '+91 6374 350 379' is updated to use +916374942194 / '+91 6374 942 194' (or equivalent correct spacing), and selecting it opens the correct tel: or https://wa.me/ link.
In ContactSection, the second phone <a href="tel:..."> link is updated from tel:+916374350379 to tel:+916374942194 and the visible text matches the new number.
No remaining occurrences of '6374350379' exist in frontend source files after the change.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify any files listed in frontend immutablePaths (read-only hooks and main entry).
Backend changes are not required for this update.
nonGoals: Changing any other phone numbers besides 6374350379.
Changing WhatsApp button styling, layout, or adding new contact channels.
